key_risks: Customer concentration risk with top four customers accounting for 70% of revenue
Labor shortages impacting project timelines and profitability
Supply chain disruptions causing rising material costs and delays
Economic sensitivity tied to telecom CapEx cycles
Inconsistent free cash flow generation limiting financial flexibility
controversies: Exposure to environmental and safety regulation violations
social_issues: Challenges in recruiting and retaining skilled labor
governance_issues: Need for consistent adherence to corporate governance and compliance standards
